userStories.title: Read schema and analyze HTML structure
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze sample HTML files to identify data patterns
Map HTML structure to schema fields

userStories.title: Create build extraction script
acceptanceCriteria: Parse HTML files from html/ directory
Extract required fields: build_id, source_type, build_type, build_source, source_url, year, make, model
Handle both showcase and garage page formats

userStories.title: Execute build extraction
acceptanceCriteria: Extract builds from all 12 HTML files
Save to builds.json with proper metadata

userStories.title: Verify build extraction completeness
acceptanceCriteria: Verify builds.json contains all extracted builds
Verify each build has required fields
Update sources.json with final build count
